text: @narendramodi The major power has spent trillions in wars just to keep #OilPrice in his own hands and selling it to the world through his own currency. Now it had plunge below zero as #Covid19 hits demand. Now they have to pay back. As the CORONA goes POSITIVE, OIL becomes NEGATIVE.
